dt: {bc}salmon cured especially with salt, sugar, pepper, and dill and often additional ingredients (such as fennel, coriander, lime, and vodka or {d_link|aquavit|aquavit})

et: Swedish {it}gravlax{/it} or Norwegian {it}gravlaks{/it}, from {it}grav{/it} pit, hole, grave + Swedish {it}lax{/it}, Norwegian {it}laks{/it} salmon
shortdef: salmon cured especially with salt, sugar, pepper, and dill and often additional ingredients (such as fennel, coriander, lime, and vodka or aquavit)
